Series.Actors: |Noah Wyle|Will Patton|Moon Bloodgood|Sarah Carter|Colin Cunningham|Mpho Koaho|Maxim Knight|Connor Jessup|Ryan Robbins|Jessy Schram|Seychelle Gabriel|Peter Shinkoda|Drew Roy|
Series.Overview: The series tells the story of the aftermath of a global invasion by several races of extraterrestrials that neutralizes the world's power grid and technology, quickly destroys the combined militaries of all the world's countries, and apparently kills over 90% of the human population within a few days.
